name: brightness
description: Change macOS display brightness from the command-line

repo.name: brightness
repo.description: Command-line display brightness control for macOS.

readme.summary: Excellent documentation that clearly explains purpose, installation, and usage with helpful examples and important compatibility warnings prominently displayed.
readme.top_issue: Configuration section could be more explicit—while the tool appears to have minimal config (just the brightness value and display selection), documenting this explicitly would help users understand there are no additional settings to configure.

security.summary: The code appears to be generally secure, but there are some minor issues with input validation and error handling that should be addressed to improve its overall security posture.

common_complaints: Error -536870201 on Apple Silicon (M1, M2, M3) Macs
Brightness changes revert to initial state after seconds
External displays and Thunderbolt displays not working
System preferences brightness slider not syncing with tool output
praise_themes: Appreciation for sharing open source work
sentiment.summary: Project shows signs of decline with numerous unresolved critical bugs on modern Apple hardware, outdated Homebrew package, and minimal maintainer engagement despite 8+ years of issues.

red_flags: lack of patience with repeated questions
frequent suggestions to use alternative tools instead of resolving issues
unwillingness to engage with users lacking specific hardware
communication.summary: The maintainer's responses are technically informative but often lack patience and welcomingness, frequently suggesting alternative tools or closing issues without thorough resolution.

concerns: No commits in past 6 months (last commit March 2024)
No active contributors in past 6 months
12 open issues with no recent resolution activity
No merged PRs in past 6 months
No closed issues in past 6 months
Unknown last release date suggests no recent versioning
maintenance.summary: The brightness package appears abandoned with no development activity, contributor engagement, or issue resolution for at least 6 months.

analysis_summary.doc_summary: The README provides clear and concise information about the package's purpose, installation, and usage examples, but lacks detailed configuration documentation.
concerns: no commits in the past 6 months
open issues and PRs with no recent activity
Docs: Lack of detailed configuration documentation
Community: brightness setting issues on M1/M2 Macs
Communication: lack of patience with repeated questions
Communication: frequent suggestions to use alternative tools instead of resolving issues
High bus factor risk (92% from top contributor)
highlights: some contributors are still listed as active in the past 6 months
